channel.title: CVE Feed for Imagely -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Imagely -- all products

item.title: CVE-2016-6565|2024-08-06T01:36:28.098Z -- imagely -- nextgen%20gallery%20plugin
item.description: The Imagely NextGen Gallery plugin for Wordpress prior to version 2.1.57 does not properly validate user input in the cssfile parameter of a HTTP POST request, which may allow an authenticated user to read arbitrary files from the server, or execute arbitrary code on the server in some circumstances (dependent on server configuration).

item.title: CVE-2024-39627|2024-08-01T22:30:47.822Z -- imagely -- nextgen%20gallery
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Imagely NextGEN Gallery allows Stored XSS.This issue affects NextGEN Gallery: from n/a through 3.59.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-39627|2024-08-02T18:18:55.754Z -- imagely -- nextgen%20gallery
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Imagely NextGEN Gallery allows Stored XSS.This issue affects NextGEN Gallery: from n/a through 3.59.3.
